Uses of Package
com.opengamma.strata.calc.config

  • Packages that use com.opengamma.strata.calc.config 
    Package Description
    com.opengamma.strata.calc
    Calculate risk measures on trades, applies scenarios and manages market data.
    com.opengamma.strata.calc.config
    Configuration types for the calculation engine.
    com.opengamma.strata.calc.config.pricing
    Configuration types for specifying how calculations should be performed.
    com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner
    Types used when running calculations.
    com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function
    Contains the interfaces implemented by functions that perform calculations in the calculation engine.
    com.opengamma.strata.report.framework.expression
    Provide the ability to extract data using textual expressions.
  • Classes in com.opengamma.strata.calc.config used by com.opengamma.strata.calc 
    Class and Description
    MarketDataRules
    Market data rules specify what market data should be used when calculating measures for a target.
    Measure
    Identifies a measure that can be produced by the system.
    ReportingRules
    A set of rules that decide how calculation results should be reported.
  • Classes in com.opengamma.strata.calc.config used by com.opengamma.strata.calc.config 
    Class and Description
    AllTargetsMarketDataRule
    A market data rule which matches all calculation targets.
    AllTargetsMarketDataRule.Meta
    The meta-bean for AllTargetsMarketDataRule.
    CalculationTaskConfig
    Configuration of a task that calculates the value of a single measure for a target.
    CalculationTaskConfig.Builder
    The bean-builder for CalculationTaskConfig.
    CalculationTaskConfig.Meta
    The meta-bean for CalculationTaskConfig.
    CalculationTasksConfig
    Configuration for a set of tasks that calculate values of measures for a set of targets.
    CalculationTasksConfig.Builder
    The bean-builder for CalculationTasksConfig.
    CalculationTasksConfig.Meta
    The meta-bean for CalculationTasksConfig.
    DefaultMarketDataRule
    A MarketDataRule implementation which matches a target based on its type.
    DefaultMarketDataRule.Meta
    The meta-bean for DefaultMarketDataRule.
    DefaultMarketDataRules
    The default implementation of MarketDataRules containing a list of MarketDataRule instances.
    DefaultMarketDataRules.Builder
    The bean-builder for DefaultMarketDataRules.
    DefaultMarketDataRules.Meta
    The meta-bean for DefaultMarketDataRules.
    FunctionConfig
    Configuration of a function that performs a calculation.
    FunctionConfig.Meta
    The meta-bean for FunctionConfig.
    FunctionConfigBuilder
    Mutable builder for building instances of FunctionConfig.
    MarketDataRule
    A market data rule decides what market data should be used in calculations for a calculation target.
    MarketDataRules
    Market data rules specify what market data should be used when calculating measures for a target.
    Measure
    Identifies a measure that can be produced by the system.
    ReportingRules
    A set of rules that decide how calculation results should be reported.
  • Classes in com.opengamma.strata.calc.config used by com.opengamma.strata.calc.config.pricing 
    Class and Description
    FunctionConfig
    Configuration of a function that performs a calculation.
    Measure
    Identifies a measure that can be produced by the system.
  • Classes in com.opengamma.strata.calc.config used by com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner 
    Class and Description
    CalculationTasksConfig
    Configuration for a set of tasks that calculate values of measures for a set of targets.
    MarketDataRules
    Market data rules specify what market data should be used when calculating measures for a target.
    ReportingRules
    A set of rules that decide how calculation results should be reported.
  • Classes in com.opengamma.strata.calc.config used by com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function
